titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 4810) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 103(a)(1) of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2001.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-766, by Ms. Pryce (OH).

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 4810. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read. H. Res. 556 is laid on the table.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 262.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 559.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 279 - 140 (Roll no. 417).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/19/2000--Introduced. Waives points of order against consideration of the conference report on H.R. 4810 (budget reconciliation).
